channel.title: Connecting to server error
channel.description:
Hello. I am in the same room as my brother with two different computers. I am hosting a server but he cannot connect, I have allowed port 43594 through my windows firewall, portfowarded it through my router and set up no-ip DUC.
Is there something i'm doing wrong?
Regards 3 Hit.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2008, 03:56:19 PM[/size][hr]BTW, I am hosting, my brother is connecting to the server.
